term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - spectral radiant intensity, I_λ
term.title: spectral radiant intensity

item.text: The radiation intensity, I at wavelengthλ per unit wavelength interval. The SI unit is W m-1 sr-1, but a commonly used unit is W nm-1 sr-1.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2276 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
